item.title: Just another day in the OpenBSD mailing lists
item.description:
But both paper and CDs can be intercepted and tampered with (with some effort).

Well then you need to meet Theo in person and obtain the keys from him directly. Except, how would you know it was really Theo?

https://marc.info/?l=openbsd-misc&m=144983687717897&w=2
